text: 4.4: Zo 1.18; 12.31; 12.45; 2 Ko 4.4; Ef 2.2; Fi 2.6; Kor 1.15; Hi 1.3Satan, ana kha nuiana gari guma ma. Ana mba gumgi muuŋgim, mbe ndɨkndɨgir mpɨrigim, mbe gɨngɨnan ki. Mbe Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ khothɨgi fhu. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ vhavar ŋaar gum Kraisan vhava ŋaar bakɨ mben ndavi vherir ŋgirgɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe Krais garav, khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi fhuvara, ana Fhe Bakɨ guarara fara muuŋgi.
